divs: Sighting DetailsI'm a student at Pasadena City College. At around 10:50 AM I was walking down Colorado Blvd. heading to class when I heard the faint noise of a helicopter. I looked up to see a black colored helicopter hovering over campus at a very high altitude. I then noticed toward the north, over the mountains, a bright cylinder shaped object moving slowly in a north-east direction. It clearly had no helicopter blades, or wings. Its movement was not like a balloon either, it would move toward the north-east, then stop and hover completely still, then move again in the same direction, it did this about 4 or 5 times, then as it got farther it faded out of view. Once it was out of view the helicopter then left in a north-west direction, as though it had been observing it.
